mapper.insert: insert into attraction(place_no, place_name, place_address, place_content, x, y, place_category,place_local, place_img) values (place_no.nextval,#{place_name},#{place_address}, #{place_content}, #{x}, #{y}, #{place_category},#{place_local}, #{place_img})

insert into home(home_no, home_name, home_address, x, y, home_content, home_local, home_type, home_img) values (home_no.nextval, #{home_name},#{home_address},#{x}, #{y}, #{home_content},#{home_local},#{home_type},#{home_img})
mapper.select: select * from attraction where place_local=#{place_local} and place_category=#{place_category}
